ovdesc.p: Details relating to the Trading Position of each security are recorded within this file. The information is selected by book and security and kept updated whenever a bond is traded.

desc.p: This field specifies the current Impairment loss

Ex dividend accrual adjustment details for split month end processing. Multi-valued field consisting of nominal, accrued amount to next day, accrued amount to today, accrued amount for next day, start date and payment date.
Specifies the amount of the Trade Consideration.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Currency revaluation amount posted in local currency.
Date of COB entered transactions, non-stop processing only.
Specifies the Date and Time that the Position was last updated.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
The field holds the value dated realized profit/loss of the position.
NoInput Field.
This field will display an Average Yield which is derived from the yields on the transactions. The system will use the average price concept to derive the average yield of the position.

The rules are as follows: 1. If position changes from 'long to short' or 'short to long' then use the yield on the new trade; else 2. if 'buy on short' or 'sell on long' then use the current average yield on the position; 3. otherwise work out the new average yield by using the true cost of position where true cost of pos = value dated cost of pos - discount provision
No input field.
Issuer from security details.
Specifies the daily accrual balance for this security position.
Non Input Field.
Defines the Key which provides access to the records within this file.
Non Input Field.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Specifies the Statement Numbers of the accounting entries.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
Specifies the Type of Trade Transaction.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Specifies the Override conditions resulting from the transaction.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field.
Specifies the date the Coupon was calculated and posted to the Accounting System.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Settlement Currency of the security traded.
Non Input Field.
Customer number of the dealer book.
This field holds the discount accrual prior to the Euro Security redenomination.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 18 characters may be entered.

This field contains the value of Contingent P/L. It represents the P/L of trades which are forward valued dated.The value in this field will reduced on the value date. The amount in this field is represented in the Local Currency.
None
Customer residence from customer details.
Defines the Reference number which identifies the Trade.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Specifies the discount provision adjustment when a 'buy on short' or 'sell on long' transaction is encountered.
NOINPUT filed.
Specifies the sum of the Trade Nominals as per the related Value Date in field 13.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 13 - 16.
List of transactions entered during current COB, non-stop processing only.
Specifies the Current Accrual Repo IENC Balance that has accrued on the particular security to date.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
Specifies the amount of Coupon Accrual that was posted to the Accounting System.
Non Input Field.
This field specifies the current impairment loss in local currency
Sub asset type, from security details.
Specifies the Value Date for the purpose of calculating the contents of fields 13 and 14.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 13 - 16.
This field is used to hold EIR(EFFECTIVE INTEERSET RATE
Specifies the last trade price that was used during Trade Input.
Non Input Field.
Source id, record/position id.
Target, from customer details.
Product category, from portfolio details.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
Specifies the Discount Accrual IENC Balance that has accrued on the particular security to date. This is the -ve of discount provision to date.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the amount of Coupon that was posted to the Accounting System.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the balance of the Coupon Discount Accrual IENC due by the Value Date of the Trade.
Non Input Field.
Interest basis from the security details
Category, from portfolio details.
Specifies the amount of Accrued Interest on the Trade.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
This field will display a Yield for the value dated security transaction based upon the general formula of;
CONSID. = CF1/(1+r) + CF2/(1+r)**2 + etc + CFn/(1+r)**n
Where; r = Yield CFn = Income during period n n = number of days since trade divided by number of days in year.
The yield will then be found by iteration.
No input field.
Specifies any coupon difference amount that was posted to the Accounting System, in order to zeroise the IENC balance.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Consolidation Asset Balance of the designated security.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Consolidation Contingent Debit Balance of the designated security.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
Specifies the Date of the last Revaluation.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Consolidation Contingent Credit Balance of the designated security.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
Defines the Key to the Consolidation entry record.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the sum of the Net Open Accruals as per the value date in field 13.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 13 - 16.
Defines the Security Code portion of the key, together with the Short Name.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Current Realized Profit/Loss on the particular security.
Non Input Field.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
Defines the discount pl to date of the transaction.
NOINPUT field.
This field contains the value of Contingent P/L. It represents the P/L of trades which are forward valued dated.The value in this field will reduced on the value date.
The amount in this field is represented in the Trade Currency.
None
Specifies the Current Cost of Position for the designated security.
This is provided on-line and includes the start of period cost of position plus the cost of all transactions up to the present position.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the amount of the Revalued Unrealized Profit/Loss in the Local Currency.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the discount/premium of the value dated position.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the value date of the position.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the amount of the Value Dated Cost of Position.
Calculated as Current Cost of Position less all Net Open Considerations.
Non Input Field.
This field will hold the sum of local currency equivalent of the entries raised against LIVEDB/LIVECR bucket.(i.e. Entries that will update CONSOL.TRADING.BAL field)
Industry from customer details
Specifies the Currency of the Security traded.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Cost of the Settled Position.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
Specifies the Date that the security was last settled.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Nominal Amount of the Trade.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Specifies the amount of the Trade Clean Price.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Specifies the Current Average Price of the security.
This is provided on-line and is the average of the start of period average price plus the prices of all transactions up to the present.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the sum of the Net Open Considerations as per the Value Date in field 13.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 13 - 16.
Specifies the amount of the Value Dated Position.
Calculated as Current Position less all Net Open Nominals.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Current Accrual IENC Balance that has accrued on the designated security.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the discount/premium of the security transaction.
Non Input Field.
This field holds the lowest recorded market price for the security of this holding. The field is cleared if the nominal of the holding is returned to zero.
It is used for the revaluation of dealer books that have the POST.UNREAL.PL field set to RVAL.
Unrealised P&L.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
Specifies the Amount of Funding required for the existing position.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
Specifies the amount of the Settled Position in the particular security.
Non Input Field. This field is reserved for future use.
This field specfies the highest loss of Impairment
Product currency, from security details.
Source file, SC.TRADING.POSITION
This field will display a Yield for the value dated security position based upon the general formula of;
CUR.COST.POSITION = CF1/(1+r) + CF2/(1+r)**2 + etc + CFn/(1+r)**n
Where; r = Yield CFn = Income during period n n = number of days since trade divided by number of days in year.
The yield will then be found by iteration.
No input field.
Specifies the gross realised pl of a 'buy on short' or 'sell on long' transaction. Hence Trading pl = gross realised pl - discount prov. adj.
NOINPUT field.
Specifies the Current Position in the designated security.
This is provided on-line and includes the start of period position plus all transactions up to the present.
Non Input Field.
Sector, from customer details
Defines the Security Account Number portion of the key, together with the Short Name Description.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the Date that the security was last Traded.
Non Input Field.
Specifies the date that the Coupon Accrual was calculated up to, but not including.
Non Input Field.
Currently not updated by the T24 core system.
This field will hold the capitalised interest amount by each trade.
No Input Allowed
Specifies the amount of the Revalued Unrealized Profit/Loss.
Non Input Field.
Defines the Value Date of the Trade.
Non Input Field. Multivalue field associated with fields 38 - 46.
Account officer for the dealer book portfolio
The amortised amount of the compound discount/premium from the following formula:
where Yield - value dated yield to maturity Ndays - Number of days to amortise DM - Days to maturity YD - Year days
No Input Field.
Asset type of the security.
This field holds the capitalised interest amount for the dealer book portfolio. This field will be re-valued every day in accordance with the daily increases and market price.
No Input Allowed
